attributes.action: academys are destroying our childrens educations
attributes.additional_details:
Schools appear to be jumping on the academy bandwagon with little or no thought for our childrens education. Our local school is changing the GCSE curriculum half way through their studies. Not only that they are insisting on changing the uniform for the 2nd time in 2 years.

I call on the government to intervene in this and stop failing schools on special measures being swallowed up to make these academeys which are being rushed through for financial reasons not to improve the childrens education
